wikipedia_page.main: Donald Hunter McLean (born 22 December 1934 in Rutherglen) is a Scottish former amateur football who played in the Scottish League as a wing half back for Queen's Park.

response: * Donald McLean (fur trader) (1805–1864), also known as Samadlin, Scottish fur trader in Canada
* Donald McLean (pastoralist) (1772–1850), pastoralist in South Australia
* John Donald McLean (1820–1866) Treasurer of Queensland, Australia.
